Reviews.Content: booked stay fly package hotelstayed night flying week trip leaving car parked lot hotel clean comfortable includes amenities including pool restaurant 24 hr airport shuttle arrive 6 pm parked car stay fly lot lighted appeared lot nearly boulevard cafe inside hotel offers limited lunch dinner menu free breakfast buffet raining taking flight dinner restaurant satisfactory breakfast buffet able breakfast taking 6 am shuttle airport returned 2 weeks car fine little dirty sitting outside rain definitely stay hotel flying seattle stay fly package plan gone week call hotel direct website list stay fly packages 7 days

Reviews.Title: “Mid range hotel with great polish”

Reviews.Content: hotel located roughly 3 miles south seattle sea airport international boulevard convenient visiting business folks average price visited 70 night hotel provided comfortable spotlessly clean equiped refridgerator accessible corridoor externally hotel reasonable fitness quality indoor swimming pool free wireless internet available hotel bar covering basic drinks restaurant offered simple fare low cost tasty typical menu options pasta dishes fish chips pizza free continental breakfast quality offered cereals waffles breads cakes biscuits gravy eggs fruit etc location safe parking noisy considering proximity road option definitely book impressed
